title: Turkey Takes the Christmas Case
description: A Hillcrest Witch SpecialIt was early on Christmas morning when things started to go wrong for Turkey the cat. First, he did not get his expected catnip toy. Second, there was the 'tree incident'. What could be next?  When a truck is stolen from right out front of the town party, Turkey knows he has to turn the day around. He takes the case. Can he solve it without Penny's help?  This is a short Christmas cozy mystery.
author: Amorette Anderson
